rows.label: tev020601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev020601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Victoria about the commercial district.

rows.label: tev020601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev020601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Victoria about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Victoria if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev020601_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Victoria about Belle Betty Fashions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Victoria about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Victoria about Belle Betty Fashions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Victoria about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0001
rows.name:
There are all sorts of fun shops in this district.
Cafés... Pizzerias... Clothing boutiques...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Doesn't coming here make you forget that you're on
some distant planet and not Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Of course, that's precisely why this place exists.
We're not strong enough to handle living away
from Earth while walled inside an unfamiliar world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0004
rows.name:
This district was designed to provide some of the
comforts of Earth and help relieve the stress of our
current situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0005
rows.name:
You should make sure to come by and blow off some
steam from time to time, all right? Don't just pursue
one crazy mission after another![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0008
rows.name: The shop where I work is called "Belle Betty Fashions."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0009
rows.name:
We're New LA's hottest fashion brand, releasing all of
the latest fashions for discerning women of taste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, I know there are some who say that humanity is
engaged in a fight for survival, and that this is no time
to be worrying about appearances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I say that's all the more reason to enjoy looking
your best! If you feel good about yourself today,
you'll have the courage to fight for tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Belle Betty Fashions would love to start dealing in
clothes for Ma-non women.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0017
rows.name:
But their fashion sense is so...unique. Clothes from
human designers don't seem to appeal to them
very much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0018
rows.name:
We've been trying to find a good Ma-non designer,
but we haven't had much luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG0019
rows.name:
I know that there has to be a Ma-non with a great
aesthetic sense out there somewhere. A fashion-forward
genius who can really capture their imagination![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1001
rows.name:
We're fortunate to have so many xenoform customers
in our shop lately. It's really been boosting sales.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1002
rows.name:
But the other day, we had a disturbing encounter with
a BLADE operative who came into the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1003
rows.name:
He started screaming and frothing at the mouth,
claiming we were traitors for fawning over the Ma-non.
Then he demanded that our shop be closed at once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1004
rows.name:
Naturally, our customers were terrified,
and we immediately sent a complaint to BLADE HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1005
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong—we're grateful for all that BLADE
has done for us. But that one with the crazy ideas is
nothing but trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1010
rows.name:
Mmm... This fragrance is wild!
Something about it just sends a shiver down my spine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1011
rows.name: I bet it will be a big hit with the ladies of BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1012
rows.name:
We're going to start working with Panyar to develop
products that excite non-Ma-non women as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1013
rows.name:
I hope you'll be looking forward to Belle Betty Fashions'
new worldwide product line![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1020
rows.name:
A BLADE operative named Alex had been coming into
the store and causing scenes, ranting about how we're
traitors for serving the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1021
rows.name:
He scared off a lot of our regular customers,
and impacted sales more than a little bit.
But it seems all of that is finally over![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1022
rows.name:
We heard from BLADE what happened to Alex.
And though it sounds cruel to say, I fear the man
had it coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1023
rows.name:
There have been simpleminded people waving the
banner of prejudice in every era of human history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG1024
rows.name:
But this experience has really made me wonder if there
isn't something we could do to change their minds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG2001
rows.name: Mmm... This fragrance is so calming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG2002
rows.name:
I'm sure everyone's had difficulty relaxing since we
arrived here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG2003
rows.name: A fragrance like this could be a big seller for us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG2004
rows.name:
We're going to start working with Panyar to develop
products that appeal to non-Ma-non women as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020601_MSG2005
rows.name:
I hope you'll be looking forward to Belle Betty Fashions'
new worldwide product line![ST:wait ]
